title: FS/FT: T206 Joss Portrait - raw vg+ to vg/ex
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Joss Portrait - raw vg+ to vg/ex
posts.post_content:
Card is well centered but has a tiny paper wrinkle at the bottom that is nearly invisible, otherwise it would be at least a vg/ex.  I'm calling it a vg+ to be conservative.  It will definitely grade.  $195 dlvd OBO.  PM or email if any questions.  References available upon request.

Eric
